website_summaries.verdict: This hair removal cream is straightforward to use and is suitable for most consumers with sensitive skin.
pros: Formulated for sensitive skin and for use on the body and legs
Less likely to cause rash or irritation than some competing brands
Comes in a pump bottle that makes application easy
cons: May not remove all coarse hair
Results may be inconsistent for some users

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like a close shave, WITHOUT shaving!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my lady parts because I have extremely sensitive skin when it comes to shaving and waxing, especially if it's frequently. Fierce ingrown hairs and razor burn. 👎🏼 I tried a small spot first and didn't have any side effects so I went for the whole shebang. Left it on for 9 minutes. Wiped off with a warm washcloth and boom, silky smooth everywhere! I would recommend layering it a little thick so it works best at getting all the hair. I had some sensitivity afterwards for a few hours but went away quickly, and it was nothing compared to what I was experiencing after shaving. Seriously, I've tried everything and this is BY FAR the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of bikini line hair removal. Regrowth ...
customer_reviews.text: The holy grail of bikini line hair removal. Regrowth is not bumpy and miserable. Why didn't I find you sooner?
customer_reviews.author: sivakumar velusamy

customer_reviews.title: Works for Men
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dude. I put this on my junk. It took the hair off. It did not hurt. I'm happy. Follow the instructions. Some advice - Don't shower before applying this stuff. Having your skin's natural oils in place helps prevent burning. If you've been working out or whatever, wait for the skin to recover a day or so before applying this.
customer_reviews.author: werner45

customer_reviews.title: Accidentally cut my eyelashes off
customer_reviews.text: Totally cut my eyelashes off by accident with this. Love it, works great, lots of different ways to use this (with guards or without). Just don't get impatient with the small blade when you're trimming your eyebrows and flip it around to the longer one. You're gonna have a bad time.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: It does remove hair and nice shave piece accessory
customer_reviews.text: This done a good job removing hair. I wish I hadn’t left it on for so long though. It ate at my skin but of course that was my fault. I’ll put cocoa butter on my irritated skin and won’t leave it on until I feel like washing it off next time. Don’t leave this product on skin too long. Just read the directions and don’t scratch your skin and don’t use a puff ball to wash it off of you. It might scratch your skin.
customer_reviews.author: MyPrime

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, smell ok, burns my hands when using it, shipping was great
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well but doesn't remove all the hair, I do have to admit that I always have to use it at least twice just to remove the hair, also it said "leave on for 5 minutes" but honestly I'd would leave it on at least 10/15 minutes Smell ok, I'm not the biggest fan but it doesn't smell awful Shipping was fast so I loved that And I'll update this more if I use it again and have a different result UPDATE: After using it the second time it burns the living hell out of my finger! and I only had it on for a second! What the heck!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Effectively dissolves surface hair, but can leave sub-surface hair which can become ingrown "razor burn".
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves both thick and thin surface hair, but doesn't work so well on the hair follicles. The scrapping tool tends to simply break off chemically weakened surface hair and leaves behind hair below the surface. Even without using the scrapping tool, below surface hair remains and becomes ingrown in short order. My experience has been that the application of this formula resulted in smooth, hair free, skin followed by "razor rash" from undissolved (dislodged) hair under the surface. My experience may be atypical, but be aware that this is a possible outcome.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyebrow trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my face and eyebrows the most and absolutely love it! Brought it on a Bachelerotte weekend and all of the girls were using it!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Gave me chemical burn, and I don't even have ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave me chemical burn, and I don't even have very sensitive skins. I only had it on for 3 minutes and it started burning. I powered through for the full 10 (I had a date that day) And when I took it off, all my hair was still there, and I couldn't shave because of the chemical burn.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Works on hairy beasts
customer_reviews.text: Please look at my attached photos. The applicator made this test so simple to use! Left it on for 6 minutes on my partner's legs and wallah! Beautiful, free of hair patch. I had used Nair prior and was not too happy with the results. However, these are very promising results.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Trims hair, is waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Essentially, this did what it's supposed to - trim hair! Both the bikini and eyebrow trimming heads work for their intended purpose. It also is waterproof. The handle is long enough to reach where I need, it is small enough to fit into small areas, and it doesn't nick or burn me. The reasons I didn't give it five stars are that you sometimes need to go over an area multiple times to catch all the hairs, and the case is poorly designed so that it is difficult to close, and things fall out easily. Overall a good product though.
customer_reviews.author: BabyCat24

customer_reviews.title: Works on my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I feel like over the last 15 years these hair removers have gotten better and more gentle. This particular choice has been the best if these products I've used. I alllllways get a rash when using these types of products. This type if Veet is the only one that leaves my skin pretty soft actually and completely rash free. It still has "that smell" but it's not nearly as harsh as old school nair. I have sensitive skin, semi course blonde to brown hair and use maybe 1x month.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-area, adjustable hair removal device -- eyebrows and bikini
customer_reviews.text: Loving this device!Tried the eyebrow first and it's great that it adjusts left-to-right and has two sides -- haven't used something else with this much functionality. I also liked the grip because I felt very in control. It did a great job on the brows! It's super easy to change to the bikini attachment and I am happy it's waterproof because that's definitely shower time grooming for me. Liked that it came in a beauty pouch to store all the attachments as well (nothing crazy, but there are a lot of pieces and functionality so it was a pro for me to have somewhere to store it all after opening the box. Really happy with this pre-summer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MRGNYC3300

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as expected. I used it a couple times worked alright then a month later got it back out all of a sudden it didn’t work anymore. I changed the batteries and without any of the attachments it would come on. When I put a attachment on it would not work at all. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Erin O

customer_reviews.title: if you prefer to apply it with your hands like me, get yourself some gloves
customer_reviews.text: Easier than shaving? Yes. but it damages your hands if your not careful, if you prefer to apply it with your hands like me, get yourself some gloves, whether cheap disposable, or cleaning gloves. Having minor chemical burns on your fingers isn't fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice now and both times disappointed. I followed the directions exactly, it does remove hair but not all of it, and only for about 3 days. Not 4 weeks like it says. I dont have thick or dark hair in the slightest. This also takes forever to do, and forces you to stand around in awkward positions depending on where you need to remove hair. Which might be ok if it actually worked. 2 stars for ineffectiveness and inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: BrAlMo

customer_reviews.title: Use the spatula provided to get better results
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate shaving anything. But getting majority of my body waxed is pretty expensive. The first time I ever shaved my legs in high school I used this & it worked so I decided to give it a go again. The first time I used it I put it on using my hands, which I would not recommend, since it came out super blotchy and I had to do it again. The next day I used the spatula provided which gave me great results. Now I left it on for 10 mins because I also noticed on the first day when I rubbed it on with my hands that it didn’t get my thinner hair.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I use this product roughly once a week! It is so much better than shaving and it doesn't burn my skin. I use it to remove hair on my bikini area and arm pit and the hair comes off within 8-10 minutes :) Remember to not let it stay on too long.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Teen Girls!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12yr old who is very self conscious about her legs ever since 4th grade. She will not wear anything where her legs are showing unless they're completely bald. I don't always have time to assist her so this pump bottle is PERFECT! She has been doing this herself for about 3yrs now, with no mess, burns or bumps - the thing is just amazing. We follow the directions and we have zero concerns or issue. If you have teen girls who are like my kid, get this! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy P.

customer_reviews.title: Balls smoother than a slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy, I have sensitive skin, I like to keep my downstairs trimmed and clean. Was skeptical of this stuff down there and on my sensitive skin. Did a quick trim with a trimmer before using the this stuff, waited 7mins and spatula’d it off and... razor smooth with literally no irritation or razor bumps. Absolutely smooth balls and pube area. Gonna go it again tomorrow on the surrounding area and my b-hole (TMI but deal with it) because I’m happy with how it turned out tonight. Solid product, highly recommend especially if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Works, but a little tricky.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a waste of money. Does NOT leave silky smooth skin at all. I left it on for 10 minutes (the maximum) and applied it very thickly and it STILL left stubble. For full body, DEFINITELY do not buy this. I ended up using over half the bottle and was left with subpar results (could've just used an electric razor. Maybe this stuff would be worth it if you're wanting to shave a particular spot that is prone to razor burns and ingrown hairs, but this does not replace shaving at all.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Burned my skin & didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: My armpits are pretty sensitive. This burned my skin!! The instructions said to keep on for no longer then 10 minutes. I kept on for 5 minutes to see just Incase my skin didn't like it.. I felt it burning in 2 minutes so I took it off in 5 and my armpits were bright pink and the hair didn't even come off! Amazon refunded me without having to return which is great but I'm really disappointed because I really wanted to love this :(
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good razor
customer_reviews.text: I had another eyebrow razor a long time ago and I loved it. The razor was in a different spot and I haven't been able to find any like it since. So I bought this one and I think it's a close second because it has a side with a longer razor and the other side has a short razor for the tighter spots. It also comes with a bikini attachment which works just as good. A lot safer than scissors!
customer_reviews.author: NLD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ...  descrption decieving
customer_reviews.text: Description says pack of (2) however I only recieved (1) bottle of product. i normally use Nair hair remover and I only bought this one because it said (pack of 2) in descrption. I want my other bottle of product no matter what. Please respond because this is consumer deception. Update : I talked to customer service and received my 2nd bottle free of charge. I am happy now but the whole description needs to be changed if it’s only 1 bottle
customer_reviews.author: I. Will ❤️

customer_reviews.title: I’m hooked, good bye shaving good bye waxing hello Veet
customer_reviews.text: Product warns against using on your private areas .... But let me tell you, I did and I’m glad I did. First I did a small patch test to make sure I didn’t have a reaction to it. I applied a thick layer over the entire vag, I let it sit for ten minutes (I did not experience any burning whatsoever). I then used a wet towel to wipe it clean and omg it all came off so easy and effortless. No bumps no nicks nothing. I suggest doing it before you shower so you don’t open up your pores. Apply an unscented lotion after you wipe it off clean and wipe with water and boom soft kitten :)
customer_reviews.author: NERDG2020

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I applied this product on my extremities ( arms and legs) and it was fine until 7 -8 minutes after, I started feeling a tingling burning sensation on my arm. I figured it was a sign to wash it off and i did and the sensation went away. Over all, it is a great product for the price as long as you don't leave it past 10 minutes or close to 10 minutes depending on the sensitivity of your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kayorcity

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I have always had course and dark leg hair so I wasn’t expecting a miracle, but I did expect it to work better than it did. Applied as directed. Chose to use my hands to really get it applied well. Tested at 5 min and no hair came up, so waited 5 more min (max of 10 stated on bottle). It removed hair but very very patchily. Having to scrape with the plastic spatula is just as much work as shaving and then I still had to shave since it missed so much hair. Will probably not use again. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: AStewart

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to waxing while you are in quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Due to the corona virus pandemic I haven't been able to keep my waxing appointments. I have been waxing for almost 20 years. While self-quarantining I really wanted to avoid shaving, so I ordered this cream. It works wonderfully!! I highly recommend it. Yes, it is not as thorough as waxing. But considering the circumstances, it keeps my bikini line in check.
customer_reviews.author: Washington girl

customer_reviews.title: It works but not really worth it to me
customer_reviews.text: So it works, but I wouldn’t count on it for a smooth “shave.” I have to go over spots of my legs with my razor every time. I don’t think it has any benefit to me over shaving, other than guaranteed no cuts. It feels no smoother than shaving, I don’t think it lasts any longer, and it’s just as much time and effort (if not more). Definitely does not get ingrown hairs as it claims. I had high hopes, but I think I’ll stick to shaving after I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't my favorite, sticking to razors.
customer_reviews.text: Okay only thing I will say is that it worked with sensitive skin, there was no breaking out or rash. However it was spotty when used if you literally didn't lather it on super thick. It smelled horrible even though it claims to not have that "egg" scent. I occasionally let it sit on top of my toes for the little hairs but haven't used it since. It removed a lot of hair but again patchy such as on my bikini area. Trust me I went all in with this product, followed instructions, took my time and everything. I'll just stick to shaving and leave it in my shower for people who forget theor razors
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flareau

customer_reviews.title: First use, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this product today and very happy. I have sensetive skin and burn easy from chemicals. So, far no discomfort or redness. My skin is soft and hair removed. These products sometimes will burn if you use AFTER a shower or if your pores are open, like after a work out. I use BEFORE getting my skin wet or hot. That seems to keep the reaction at bay. Of course never guaranteed, this is just my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Witchlua

customer_reviews.title: Has been fantastic for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for several years. I use it on my arms, legs, and bikini area. I apply it before I get in the shower, wait a few minutes, get in and use either a shower sponge or wash cloth to help remove. It gets all the hair, last about a week, and my skin feels ah-mazing afterwards. You have to rinse really really well to avoid irritation and don't use soap right after using this. I tried it on my underarms and I didn't have any issues it's just hard to apply both and hold my arms up for so long. I've waxed them for years instead.
customer_reviews.author: True Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I know it says not to use this on the bikini area but that’s the only place I use it and I haven’t experienced any problems. I use it once a week now and I love it! I just leave it on for 10 min, hop in the shower and gently use a loofah to remove it. It comes with a plastic spatula for removal but I prefer to just shower it off. It does have a slight smell but mild compared to other products I’ve used in the past. Also good for anyone with sensitive skin! I have very sensitive skin so I tested it out on a small area beforehand and I suggest doing the same.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: It is shaving cream, not depilatory cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a shaving cream, not a depilatory cream. It shaves hair by breaking it at skin level, does not depilate softening the hair loose to the root like a depilatory cream. Hair keeps growing at the same rate so it has no permanent effect although some hair does come out complete with the root. Very bad smelly, a mess to use, burns if left for too long, leaves the skin very soft and terse. I will be looking for depilatory creams, this one is good to start regrowing hair or for shaving every so often.
customer_reviews.author: syntotic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, I have super sensitive and reactive skin and this did not cause any issues. I used this on my legs (until I gather the courage for bikini line) for 8 min total, checking around the 6 min mark because I am scared lol Got all the hair except where I applied it too thin, so make sure you really coat the areas you want hair removed. Easy to get off and kinda fun to use the spatula, but ended up using a cloth because, again, I was scared hahah Good for if you're lazy and are tired of razor burn!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: The best hair removal product I've found YET!
customer_reviews.text: The best body hair removal product I've found YET! Works great to remove the hair from underarms and on the unmentionables. Way better than Nair and a few other brands. What I like about this product is they have several ways for you to seal it closed so that the formula doesn't go bad. You must twist it closed after use and put the plug bag inside of the top. This extends the life of the product. Other products I used would seem to go bad after a few uses and I would never get my monies worth.
customer_reviews.author: Reec3

customer_reviews.title: Messy learning curve
customer_reviews.text: There must be a learning curve to this. I covered many body parts, then set the alarm for 5 minutes. I should’ve left it on a little longer under my arms (applied 1st then scraped 1st). It removed some hair, but not all. My legs saw better results. However, I has a hot mess! Covered in cream, not sure how to move. My tub and shower are separate, so it was a TASK to transfer after scraping. Lol! I made a huge mess too! I’m sure all of these issues are user error. I will try again next week. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am a brown skin woman with thick, dark course hair. This product has worked so well for my upper thigh area where I often get razor bumps! I was so surprised that this actually worked for me. I definitely needed all 10 minutes. And i can see I may need to do it often, but I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Depillatory
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years (which should tell you how much I like it!), and did not find it on a recent visit to my local superstore. It is very creamy, and spreads well, and does not have a harsh odor. It also does not burn skin, even if left on for the maximum time (10 minutes). It comes with a plastic blade (which I have not used) for the last step prior to rinsing. And it washes off well, and removes the unwanted hairs pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: DFBMan

customer_reviews.title: Shave and save your time
customer_reviews.text: This worked well but not perfectly. The smell is a little string and I put the cream (it’s definitely NOT a gel) on my hand. It stayed in place, but even after 10 minutes, the hair wasn’t completely removed when using the plastic spatula that’s included. I think maybe I needed another 5 minutes, but I didn’t want to peel my skin off - my skin was already feeling irritated. Overall, I think it’s more trouble than it’s worth. Might as well Just shave and save your time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Hairy girl’s Dream!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Veet hair removal. I’m a person that has a lot of fast growing thick hair and shaving is so annoying. Especially when I can feel the hair the next day. I put Veet on my legs , bikini (outter, have to be careful ) and butt . I love it . When I shave I get a lot of bumps and it takes me forever to shave my fully body (1hour ). Ever since I started using Veet it has been way better. No bumps ,only takes 20min and it leves my skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Anette N.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre results
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for chest and stomach hear removal. The smell is a little strong but it's not as bad as some reviews say. I left it on for the full 10 minutes but the results were spotty. It didnt remove all the hair and I still had to shave which defeats the purpose. Products like this are tough because the results are based largely on each person's hair/body. Didn't quite get the results I wanted but it wasn't totally ineffective either. For the price, it's worth trying. May work for you, may not.
customer_reviews.author: D. Avondale

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i bought this hoping it would be different from the stuff i use if i havent shaved my legs in awhile and it sure does work! 2 weeks of hair growth below the waist gone and its good for armpits too! the only complaint is that in 2 spots it didnt get everything but touch up work is easy enough, OH and yes you can use it for everywhere including private parts, on the bottle it claims to help reduce ingrown hairs and it has definately worked for me! try it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan V.

customer_reviews.title: Buy veet
customer_reviews.text: Here's my honest review: -Doesn't smell great -Moisturizes the hell out of your skin and makes it baby smooth -Doesn't hurt your private areas even if left on for the max amount of time (don't put it where there isn't hair) -Doesn't take all hair off but makes it so that you can pull leftover pieces with literally 0 pain or effort -For the best result you may want to use it a couple of times but I think this is a much safer option compared to Nair
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy but super rough regrow hair.
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my armpit and as other people's answered question suggest, I also tried to used it or bikini regions. It's very quick and easy to use, very effective, the hair seems to be removed at about 90% rate. I was happy. Until my hair grows back up. It's very itchy and my skin was very rough. I usually use the epilator, the only one problem with it is that sometimes it got my skin lol. That's why I guess I wanted to try this to see if things would be easier. But nah, I'll just go back to the epilator - painful but super effective, sometimes skin got caught but it's okay hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Linh D.

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first however, surprised and had great results
customer_reviews.text: I typical shave as a male using a razor and would have ingrown hairs along the back side of my legs. After using Nair I had no ingrowns and my skin was left soft. It took about 6 mins and I just apply a thin coat as I would sun screen as well I am a Latin lightskinned individual. No chemical Burns! I was thinking since I do have semi sensitive skin I would have chemical burn. But no. I will keep purchasing this product. After the 6 minute timer was up I used a loofah in the shower as I normally would and all the hair was removed from my body, legs, arms and definitely had no patches.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Florez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Men, don't be afraid to try it.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for a year now and I must say I love it. when it comes to hair removal. this does the Job. I use it on my chest for the most part. It gets the job done and does it in great style. however it doesn't work well with coarse hair well, I tried using it for my facial hair, it didn't do anything. I left it on for almost 20 minutes and still nothing. oh well it was worth a shot, Im still buying this for my body so I say its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: collin

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad lol
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. I really only need it for above the knee skin. All my skin from the knee up cannot tolerate shaving. It works on the skin I need it to work on. So I'm happy with it for that. However, it just won't work from the knee down. Even when I use it for a full 10 mins, I still end up shaving! It's ridiculous! So idk, I'll continue to buy it till I get a laser hair remover. But it's ridiculously weird lol Also, it doesn't smell too bad, and it doesn't burn and sting like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: My Redeemer Lives

customer_reviews.title: Better than razor
customer_reviews.text: It does its job; which is remove hair from the body thus giving you an illusion of smoothness. While Veet does remove body hair, it doesn’t leave you feeling smooth like razors. In fact, immediately after use, run your fingers across your legs and you’ll still feel stubble. Not to mention, the hair reproduces in lightening speed. However for sensitive skin its not that good. I got several red spot because of itching.
customer_reviews.author: Dibash Chimoriya

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This hardly worked for me at all. I let my hair grow for a few days then applied this and let it sit per the instructions. And it got like 55% of the hair off but my skin couldn't handle a second application. It didn't work at all under my arms, but it left a pretty fierce sunburnt feeling on my skin. Finally, this is what hell smells like...like ammonia and failure. But the pump worked great and the product went on smoothly and easily. There's a little plug that keeps the bottle airtight. It could easily work for someone else. But for my skin type and hair type it was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works, smells great, and can use on face if not sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow. I've always used cream hair removers. And this is the best I've ever used. It works for me withen 5-7 minutes i have this hairs. Using a damp wash cloth is the best way to put it on. It says to no use on your face. But ive used their face cream hair remover and this works better in 3 minutes. Its doesn't smell terrible. Ive had worse. This is my holy grail for now on. The price is amazing. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin&Island

customer_reviews.title: Not worth trying! No RETURNS if it doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get Nair to remove my hair as it works really well but I decided to try out this Veet. Lemme just say that although the smell is pleasant, that’s the extent of the positive about this product. I put it on my legs as directed and after waiting over 10 minutes, it didn’t take my hair off. I don’t have course or thick hair and the little spatula it came with for you to scrape the product off of yourself, left red lines on my legs. I will never get this again and am extremely disappointed that I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Neffi

customer_reviews.title: GENTLE ON ALL AREAS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that is gentle on all areas for discretionary hair removal. A much better product than some of the competitive labels. Bottle is also easy to use, hold and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Not too impressed with this product at all. I suffer from sensitive skin, in which razors always leave behind a rash regardless of location on my body. So I’m always trying to find a razor less shaving option...this one was disappointing. The tool provided is not comfortable at all. The product itself didn’t seem to do much and ended up having to use a razor any way...cue the rash to soon follow of course. Will continue my search as this did not do the trick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: The Woes of Ingrown Hair
customer_reviews.text: It claims to reduce ingrown hairs, not eliminate it. So going through that sort of pain was slightly a bitter experience on my part. I'd have better luck not having ingrown hair by shaving my legs actually. It smells a bit like foul egg when you rinse it off, but as long as you constantly have water running where you're shaving you should be fine. I would also say that my legs feel incredibly silky after using this-- but again, I hate the pains of ingrown hairs from the weeks after. My body rates it 2 stars, but someone else would probably have better luck with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: (Probably) Gave me acne and difficult to wash off.
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my back and shoulders (I am a man) and it was very difficult to get off even in a shower. I was still feeling a little slimy after washing it off probably like 3 times. I initially used a towel to wipe off what I could. Secondly I got a lot of acne on my back and shoulders a few days after using it. I cant be sure that this product caused it due to the late onset but I can say that I have NEVER had acne on my back and shoulders before. I originally bought it for use on more sensitive areas but wont be using it now.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: It works but not fully
customer_reviews.text: So I was skeptical about it. But it works a little bit at least. First time trying to this was okay, it did however take off most of my armpit hair not all of my hair but most of it. It smells good too. Might have to reapply multiple times to get All hair off or just use your regular razor to finish the job. But it does take of hair
customer_reviews.author: Don671

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work As Well As One Of Their Other Products.
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Veet Botanic Inspirations Gel Cream for my genital hair removal product, but thought I would try something different. I'm not liking this product and have gone back to the original hair removal product I usually use. • You have to keep this on you longer than the other product, which has given me some chemical burns on my "sack". • It doesn't do as good of a job removing my pubic hair. • The hair also grows back quicker than when I used the other product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works with dark coarse leg hair
customer_reviews.text: I have tried waxing (professional and at home) and shaving. Both methods tend to give me infections if I use these often and I have black coarse leg hair to boot. I was skeptical of this chemical hair remover as others have left me with a chemical burn or reaction. Not only was this easy but it left my legs super smooth. Helpful note, if you have coarse hair you may need to use the spatula to remove the cream while in the shower and the hair. It helped clean the hair follicles and other hair residue while removing the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia R. Cubas

customer_reviews.title: Patience is Key In Removing hair with this product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product because it leaves your skin feeling soft and removes the hair however that’s after multiple applications and it takes awhile to actually remove the hair. I find that the spatula isn’t really much use in the removal process but like an exfoliating glove works wonders for me. The only thing I dislike is the time it actually takes for all the hair to be removed. Although the hair grows back quickly after the first couple uses, after awhile the hair is thinner and takes a longer time to regrow. All in all I give it 4 stars, it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Um....this doesn't remove hair...
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions perfectly, left it on longer than 5 minutes even, was NOT that hairy and after scraping and washing, this removed 30% of my hair, took longer and was more of a hassle than just shaving normally. Oh and if you're not used to chemical fragrances....you will hate the heavy perfume in this. There were tons of long, medium, and short hairs left and like I said, I am NOT very hairy. I had to shave after anyway. Also, i reapplied and tried again and nothing more came off.
customer_reviews.author: BlurryfaceTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Is it gone yeeeet?
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin, but you have to be patient when it’s on. There are times where I think it’s been there long enough but it doesn’t remove all the hair. And if you’re in a shower, try to turn off the water cause then you’ll just been wasting both the water and product if it’s running off your legs. I still prefer to use this than shaving as getting razor bumps or strawberry legs. I’m not a fan of the scent though.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Campos

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I am allergic to shaving cream so I typically use soap to shave my legs but doing that drys my skin out and I don’t feel like I get the closest shave because I have to stay away from razors with the moisturizer strip on them. I was kind of scared to try this product because of my sensitive skin but I had no reaction or break out at all! My skin was soft and not dried out and almost all the hair on my legs were gone! There was only one spot I had to touch up with a razor, but that was probably user error.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutPatti

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m not super impressed w/this all in one hair trimmer. The size of the “handle” makes it difficult to maneuver on the face. It was painful to use on the bikini area - kept pulling hairs no matter which direction (up or down) & the hairs were no overly long. Worked okay on the arm hair. Would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BritishHistoryNut

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and I wanted to try this on a whim. I put it all over the areas that I had hair my underarms my arms my legs. And then waited the appropriate amount of time. Instead of using the plastic comb it came with to get rid of the hair. I used a loofah in the shower and it work just as well. No major smell afterwards. But when applying you have to stay still for x amount of time in order for it to set.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for eyebrow touch-Ups!!!! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this trimmer for quick touch-up on my eyebrows and it worked perfectly! Super easy to use and small enough to throw into my cosmetics bag! Haven't tried it on the bikini line yet but since it's waterproof it will make a shower touch-up nice and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft kitty warm kitty little ball of fur
customer_reviews.text: Okay well I really hate shaving and buying razors. So. Tried this. Upon my first impression it definitely makes my life easier in the sense that while it doesn’t take away all my hair it DEFINITELY makes it leagues easier to shave. More like spot shaving. However, my main reason for getting this was for the downstairs mixup. It really didn’t do anything. Anyway, I’m trying again tonight I’ll update this if I figure it out! I’d still definitely recommend because it really does improve my shaving experience more than I could ever imagine
customer_reviews.author: Winter Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Hair gone in 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine who does hair removal referred me to this product. I was surprised as how easy it was to use. When doing it myself, I ended up using my own fingers to spread the cream on the parts of my body that I wanted to get rid of my hair. The plastic "spatula" provided wasn't of much use. I did have some sensitivity issues but not to a point that i couldn't use this product. Make sure to remove it within the 10 minute time limit or you'll irritate your skin. After washing off the cream off my legs. I was surprised as how smooth my legs were.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gonzaga

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I was very skeptical but I was desperate! I have been unable to shave my legs for many months due to some illness, so on a whim I ordered this from Amazon to see if it would work. I remember Nair in the seventies and it was disgusting and didn't work and smelled awful and probably killed us a little! Baby we've come a long way! LMAO 😂 my hair was easily two-and-a-half 3 inches long. 98% of it came off on the first application. I know if I followed up in a week and did it again it would be as smooth as a baby's bottom. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: Palmdesertdiva

customer_reviews.title: Solved my shutdown problems!!
customer_reviews.text: The salon to take care of my nether regions has been closed for 8 weeks until indefinitely. Needless to say the thick underbrush had gotten out of control and needed serious landscaping. This is the best $8 I’ve spent since I went to a $0.50 wings/$1 beers happy hour! Super easy to use (looks creepy when the hair is coming out, but whatever) and the results make me VERY happy. Not as smooth as a wax, but very close. Highly recommend. You and whoever else cuts your grass won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LegallyBlack

customer_reviews.title: Veet removed my Hair
customer_reviews.text: So I've never used any type of hair removal creams or ointments. I wanted to try something for my bikini area and decided to try Veet. I had heard of it over the years and gave it a try. I followed directions, trying out a small area first. It did well. I went ahead and used the applicator to smooth it on. I waited 5 minutes as stated. Upon rinsing, the hair came off. No redness, no stinging , no rashes. There's not a real smell. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: QueenShermear

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, baby fine leg hair, a high tolerance of pain and up until this purchase I have only shaved my legs old school style for decades. I tested this 48 hour prior to use as I was very intimidated by this kind of product. After no reaction i used it on legs, pits, and my unfortunate belly hair. So happy. It was easy to use (I will have to touch up a bit but that's on me). I only had it on for about 7 minutes max and would recommend a though shower to remove excess after use. I felt no pain and everything feels great. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to and no cuts or anything!
customer_reviews.text: I actually saw an ad for this on Cosmo and decided to get it because it seemed cheaper than constantly going to get my eyebrows threaded. I haven’t used it as much to make up for the price yet but it’s been pretty good so far. It’s very easy to use and very precise. I’ve only ever used it for my eyebrows (since I use a razor for all other parts) but perhaps I’ll switch over and use one of the other heads to do another job. There is no bumps, no cut skin, no discomfort, nothing wrong with it. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LQ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely beats shaving
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Veet gel hair remover (not the wax thingy that also shows up in the reviews) I did not have any reaction to it. This is the results of me leaving it on for 10 minutes. I don’t have stubborn hair. I am pleasantly surprised by how good it worked. I like the applicator. It did about as good of a job as shaving. As you can se there is still just a hint of hair but when I run my hand against the grain there is zero stubble. I will update this as it grows back out.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well esp in bikini area. It pulls hair, shaves uneven, weak power. Better off with men's beard trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: jahcvt

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty darn well without the Knicks
customer_reviews.text: The included spatula was a little hard to clean between swipes, and it left a lot of debris behind so it was hard to tell if I got all the hair until I rinsed. I did have to touch up with a razor. The backs of my knees burned for a few hours afterward even though I only left the product on for 10 minutes, so you might want to avoid that area. Skin stayed hair free for a few days. It does seem to be growing back slower.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Corson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, smoother legs for a longer time!
customer_reviews.text: I have HIGHLY sensitive legs, if I shave I get ingrowns or my skin gets irritated so I opted to use this and I love it!!! My legs stay smoother longer and it gets rid of most of the hair, I won’t lie, I do have to go over the areas with a shaver sometimes to make sure I got all the hair even after letting it sit for longer than You're supposed to. But I would definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin. I was hestitant to even try this but the reviews were so great I couldn't resist. Applied on my legs, bikini area, and arm pits. Ten minutes later the hair literally rubbed off with little effort. Some areas need the scraping to tool. I feel you would need to use on a few separate occasions to get the full effect. Second use in one week, no irritation and I'm silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT SHAMPOO!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this shampoo! You will lose all your hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Waters

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product did absolutely nothing on my legs, I even left it on for the full 10 minutes. However on my 'unmentionables' it did great. But you still end up shaving anyway in order to get a smooth feel. Pretty easy to use but it does have a sulphur smell. But its bearable. Would I buy it again? Probably not. The time spent applying the product, waiting for the allotted amount of time and rinsing, I could just shave and be done.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: [Veet 3in1] Not Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with low expectations but I wanted to try it because I feel I will save more money in the long run. Razors are just expensive, especially for sensitive skin people. I test this product on my calves and it's not too bad! I can see like the black follicles when sone using the cream but you dont feel stubble. The cream came with a scraper to make removing the hair & cream easier. Overal it's not an amazing product but it works pretty good. Will probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Estanislao

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I like to wax, but after just having a baby and being hot not wanting to go through the waxing process this summer and waiting for hair to get long enough to actually wax, this product is amazing!! It did not irritate my skin, it did not burn, and it smells good leaving my skin soooo smooth! I used this and then exfoliated my skin in the shower then using my favorite moisturizer left me feeling just like a fresh wax!! Please read through the precautions throughly before using as there was a lot that I didn’t know and how to use! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for those who don't want to or can't shave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product hoping that it would remove more hair than a razor (since those sometimes leave stubble behind in curvy areas of my body), but it did the exact same job as your typical razor. Honestly, it felt like it was more of a hassle than just using a razor, too. I gave it three stars because it would be a good product for people that may cut easily when shaving or who's skin is too sensitive for razor blades.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money unless you can't use razor.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Have to go over the area with a razor after as there is still stubble after use and hair grows back just as fast. Shaving is faster and works better. Kept the cream on for at least 10 min each time. Used 4 separate times and no change in how fast hair grows even though they claim 7 days. Doesn't get whole area covered. Not buying again. The only plus is skin feels silky after use.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: It’s a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bikini area. I put it on for 5 minutes then jumped in shower. It removed about 75%. After shower I put on again and left on for 10 minutes. It worked amazing. My bumps, no irritation and all gone. The only thing I would recommend is to get right in shower. It has a horrible smell
customer_reviews.author: heather v.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Found Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many depilatories, razors (even Dollar Shave Club), and waxing, but this was the best! It's easy to use, and a lot cheaper than paying for waxing by a professional. Yes, the smell isn't wonderful, but it's not disgusting or bad enough to stop me from using it! I would recommend this cream for all ages. I wish I had used this first instead of shaving, it's a lot easier and you can't cut yourself with this product. Remember, though, to test a small part of your skin before using for the first time--especially if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: PriscillaPrime

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for me, I have super sensitive skin and very stubborn hair & I am able to leave it on the full time required. I have read some say hair grows back finer and softer. That however is not my experience yet. I have used two applications so far. Will continue to use it is more inconvenient than shaving, for me but Hoping for slower growth between sessions as time goes
customer_reviews.author: CHocutt

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to shaving.
customer_reviews.text: Saw that Cardi B used this product so I had to try it. It’s a lifesaver! Cream body hair removers have significantly improved over the last 15 years. I applied it to the bikini/underarm area and the hair came right off with no irritation. This product won’t work well on peach fuzz on the face (I tried and my skin got red). Hair starts to regrow at a rate consistent with shaving
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not for Coarser Hair
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaving my legs, so I thought that I would try something new. When doing a test patch, it worked at getting out finer hair very well. That being said, it did not get the coarser hair and unfortunately my legs mostly have coarser hair, so not much hair was removed overall. As for skin sensitivity: even after washing the test area after scraping the cream off, there was still some redness and stinging, but nothing serious. I'm sure this works well for some people, just not me.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Time Left Skin varies
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. The first time I used it I followed instructions and left on my leg for 6 mins- nothing came off. Second time I decided I'd leave it 8 mins. Most of my hair came off but I still had to pass a razor. It did not work on my underarms. Not sure what would happen to my skin if left for 10 mins. Don't really want to find out. Ps: smells like Nair.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard good and bad stuff about this product. It’s a really nice product. It doesn’t completely get rid of all the hair and I just shave the rest of it off. But I’ve heard of people getting chemical burns and I just really recommend thoroughly washing it with body wash. I also recommend not keeping it on longer that 10 minutes even if it doesn’t get everything off. If you keep it on longer you could burn your skin. Other than that it’s a pretty nice product. I was skeptical at first but honestly it’s just made shaving easier by getting rid of the large hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Blistered the heck fire out of my Va’JJ
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT for sensitive areas people! Only had it on my bikini line for 2 mins because it was Literally burning the flesh off my Vag. It works great on legs and stomach but I would not use it on the parts you hold most dear. Now with a blistered Vag but silky smooth legs it’s a Hulu weekend alone in bed for me 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie J

customer_reviews.title: Good to know
customer_reviews.text: Well 5 stars it is. Smell is gross, even worse after 10 seconds of application, but I bought for sole purpose of dusting off the berries. Didn’t try on the stinker, but that wasn’t my reason for purchase. I don’t have overly sensitive skin, but was nervous for the area, rest assured, all the hair is gone and area is smooth, no irritation, curious to see how long it lasts, but won’t hesitate to applicate again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions completely. Left on 8+ minutes and I still have stubble on my legs. I don't have a lot of body hair on my legs so maybe it's not "thick" enough for the product to cling to. But honestly, it would take me less time and effort to shave my legs then go through the entire process to spread the cream, wait and then scrape off. I get a much smoother and just as long lasting finish using a razor as I did with this. And it's less messy with a razor. Waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: So much cheaper (and less painful) than sugaring!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe I wasted all that money going to get sugared for so long when I could have bought this! I have super sensitive skin and had no issues. Hair didn't all come off, but a lot did! I am sure that once I get the hang of how much to apply and how long to keep it on, this will be even better. Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Works but Not Really
customer_reviews.text: I followed everything to the letter and it kind of works but even letting it sit for 10 Minutes it doesn't remove everything, and what it does remove it doesn't remove perfectly every time. If you've got really thin hair it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Just follow directions and it will work!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to death of using this stuff. But for someone who has suffered from extreme razor bumps and ingrown hairs it has been a lifesaver. The smell is pretty strong but I've never had any trouble with a clean hair removal. I noticed when I used their tool provided, I got much better results. If I didn't use the tool, I ended up with patchy spots. And the next day, razor bumps are nonexistent! And it's soooo smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product! I used this on legs and private area. Left on legs for seven minutes and private area for nine minutes, worked rather well. This does not remove ALL hair but it removes a majority of the hair completely and the rest is easy to shave off. It is a bit of a process so I don't plan to use it regularly, but it leaves you with VERY smooth, soft skin. My legs itched a little after use but lotion fixed that right away.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I naturally have very fair skin and blonde hair. My body hair is also blonde and not very thick or course at all. I followed the package directions and much to my dismay this product did not work for me. It burned like fire in a few places on my legs even after it was washed off. After removing the product I was left with long prickly stubble and I had to shave like I normally would. Disappointing. Definitely a waste of $8.
customer_reviews.author: AprilDee

customer_reviews.title: Works, but left behind dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my face (I know it's not designed for that), and it did an excellent job removing coarse hairs as well as "peach fuzz". And it didn't exactly burn my skin too much (the redness was gone within a couple hours), but it did leave me with very dry, peeling skin. I can tend towards dry skin, so perhaps this was just my skin's reaction. However, there were also not any little red bumps like I've gotten with other products. So I may try it again and reduce the time I leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: CS

product_meta.title: Hair Remover, Veet Gel Hair Removal Cream Sensitive, 13.5 Ounce, Sensitive formula with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E (pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Style Name:GelNow live more spontaneous moments with Veet Hair Remover Cream that removes even stubborn hair in just few minutes. Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance of Vanilla and Passion Fruit for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a pump bottle with a spatula for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Suitable for: Creams can be used by everyone, including pregnant women. Teenagers under 16 are supposed to be supervised by an adult when using any depilatory method. Caution: Before every use, test your skin by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area as skin is a sensitive part of the body. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. Veet cream is not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.
feature_bullets: [EFFECTIVE HAIR REMOVAL]: Veet hair removal cream effectively removes even stubborn hair from legs and body gently in just few minutes without causing any messiness
[BEST FOR SENSITIVE SKIN]: It is best suited for sensitive skin as it is enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E that helps moisturize and soothe your skin
[DELIGHTFUL FRAGRANCE]: Hair removal cream scented with the perfect fragrance of vanilla and passion fruit for a satisfying and indulging experience
[EASY TO USE]: Hair removal cream comes in a pump-style bottle for easy dispensing, simple to apply and remove without any danger of nicks or bumps
[DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED] : Tested hair removal cream especially for sensitive skin, designed to use for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
